sentences.en: The empire had for years been falling into decadence.
sentences.cn: 这个帝国多年来已渐渐走向堕落。

sentences.en: Time, surely, to put social inclusion before defiant decadence.
sentences.cn: 显然应该是时候把社会包容置于目空一切的糜烂浮华之前了。

sentences.en: I said earlier that the decadence of our language is probably curable.
sentences.cn: 我前面说过我们的语言的堕落很可能还有救。
